title: Coca-cola style font & dirty headline font ID
content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20130317202121im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Picture6_6484.png)

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20130317202121im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Picture5_5946.png)

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20130317202121im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Picture3_4320.png)

Coca-cola typeface is similar to American Pop…

any clues appreciated!

thx,  
A
author: atw

comments.content: It's not exactly the same but the dirty one in the top pic is a font called [4990810](http://web.archive.org/web/20130317202121/http:/www.dafont.com/4990810.font) from Dafont. I'd imagine the Coca-Cola one is also there somewhere on Dafont.
